title: Continuation of the National Emergency With Respect to Significant Narcotics Traffickers Centered in Colombia
summary: The document is a notice from the White House dated October 16, 2025, announcing the continuation of the national emergency declared in 1995 regarding significant narcotics traffickers centered in Colombia. The notice states that these traffickers continue to pose an unusual and extraordinary threat to U.S. national security, foreign policy, and economy, causing extreme violence and corruption. Therefore, the national emergency declared in Executive Order 12978 is extended for another year beyond October 21, 2025. The notice will be published in the Federal Register and transmitted to Congress.
